headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body: This pull request updates the contributor docs to formalize ExecPlan usage and provides a reusable template. It adds PLANS.md with the ExecPlan rules, living sections, formatting requirements, and a ready-to-use skeleton, and updates AGENTS.md to point contributors to those rules and require keeping the living sections current when using ExecPlans. No runtime code is changed.
issueOrPullRequest.title: docs: add ExecPlan guidance and template
